attributes.action: Not demolish the Astoria and the Astoria 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to try a save the Astoria and the Astoria 2 

these iconic music venues have been host to some of the biggest bands in music and still provide a great venue for big bands as well as up and coming bands

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
